content:

thought: To craft a wooden_sword, I need to first craft oak_planks. To craft oak_planks, I need to place a stripped_oak_wood in any slot on the crafting table. The stripped_oak_wood is in slot 34, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
